templates.title: Welcome Greeting
templates.content: Hello! Welcome to HSBC. I'm here to help you today. How may I assist you?

templates.title: Account Balance
templates.content: I can help you check your account balance. For security purposes, could you please provide your account number?

templates.title: Password Reset
templates.content: I'll help you reset your password. For security, I'll need to verify your identity first. Can you confirm your full name and date of birth?

templates.title: Transfer Information
templates.content: To process your transfer, I'll need the recipient's account details and the amount you'd like to send. What's the destination account?

templates.title: Technical Issue
templates.content: I understand you're experiencing technical difficulties. Let me help troubleshoot this for you. Can you describe what exactly is happening?

templates.title: Closing - Resolved
templates.content: I'm glad I could help resolve your issue today. Is there anything else I can assist you with before we end this chat?
